introduction.now: I'm a software engineer based in Italy, and I'm currently working at {Appetize}.
introduction.passion: I love writing code for work and for fun. I'm happiest when I'm learning, experimenting with new tech stacks and solving complex problems.
introduction.education: I hold a MSc in Advanced Computer Science from the {uom}; I also completed a trilingual BSc degree at {unibz}, with an exchange semester at the {cofc}.
introduction.work: I've spent the last 7 years working for several companies, including {Booking}, {BJSS} and {Resourcify}.
introduction.cv: I hold a MSc in Advanced Computer Science from the University of Manchester, and have spent the last 6 years working for several companies, including {Booking}, {BJSS} and {Resourcify}.

skills.fullStack: While I have a solid foundation in backend development, my heart truly lies in the realm of full-stack engineering.
skills.languages: My skill set spans a range of programming languages like Java, Kotlin, Python, C# and TypeScript, as well as frontend frameworks such as React and Angular.
skills.latest: Lately I have been working a lot in the Node environment, using NextJS a lot with a backend based on OpenAPI and MongoDB. I have also been delving into UI/UX, learning how to design user interfaces with Figma and how to use Tailwind effectively.
